resources.string:
Tap to choose a page. 


Long press to navigate to that page.
Tap \"PLAY\" to play music. \nTap again to pause. \nTap and hold to reset.
Tap to choose a contact. \nLong press to call the contact.
Tap to choose a contact. \nLong press to text the contact.
Please pick me up from school.
Tap the gear icon to set the gesture or voice command for each operation.
When this operation is carried out, the current choice will be selected.
When this operation is carried out, the app will navigate to the next choice or next screen.
When this operation is carried out, the app will navigate to the previous choice or previous screen.
When this operation is carried out, the app will begin recording audio.
Tap to look through answer choices. \nLong press to select the answer choice.
